simplified: 明知山有虎，偏向虎山行

pronunciation.pinyin: míng zhī shān yǒu hǔ , piān xiàng hǔ shān xíng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ming2 zhi1 shan1 you3 hu3 , pian1 xiang4 hu3 shan1 xing2

details.simplified: 明知山有虎，偏向虎山行
details.traditional: 明知山有虎，偏向虎山行

meanings.value: to willfully go towards the mountain although knowing that it has tigers
